document_data.caption: An example of the Celestial script.
document_data.name: Celestial
document_data.creator: [[Celestial]]s
document_data.mainbody: '''Celestial''' was the script used to write the [[Celestial language]].
document_data.Notable Users:
The [[Xanathar (Zushaxx)|Xanathar]] of the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]] received a receipt for [[fish]]-food for his goldfish [[Sylgar]] from [[Skullport]] that was written in the Celestial script. It read "Bill of sale Five pounds of premium goldfish food delivered to Skullport for Mr Xanathar".<ref>

[[Xenk Yendar]]'s [[daggersword]] bore an inscription on the blade in Celestial reading "Neither Virtue Nor Blade Shall Break."{{Cite video/Honor Among Thieves}}
